channel.title: Customs| ddos protect| 100% uptime | daily updates| highscores | daily events |
channel.description:
>N0tPK<
Our ideal is maximum entertainment. We are not in this business for the money; we set up N0tPK to bring the feeling of nostalgia . We strive to ensure all of our players have an enjoyable gaming environment. N0tPK is free to play. You have the option to donate, but it is not necessary to donate for items in order to enjoy N0tPK.
A PKing and Skilling server with a 100% GUARANTEED Uptime
Are you looking for a server with perfect switches? Are you looking for a server with an active wilderness? Are you looking for a server with an active PVM and Skilling Community?
Then N0tPK is the place for you.
N0tPK has been around for well over 3 years, and continues to acquire new faces daily. The server has been active In-game, and on Forums.
-N0tPK Features-
• 24/7 Active Pking, Skilling & PVM community. • Active Forums • Weekly updates • Same Experienced Excellent Staff Members • Multiple Daily Server Events including Free For Alls, Hide and Seeks, and More! • Starter pack & ::train command (Easy leveling) • Special benefits for donators (Such as Donator’s area) • Vote Shop • Every Chaotic / Pvp item • Pk point system • Rating System • Economy is flawless
-Why should you pick N0tPK over any other server?-
• Owner is always online to help • We provide updates that the PLAYERS want • Here at N0tPK, your opinion matters • Staff members care about you • Staff will do anything to ensure your happiness
Download Client: [url=http://uppit.com/edml9n8q50q0/N0tpk_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/edml9n8q50q0/N0tpk_Client.rar[/url]
